comment: Great person and a great professor. Had him his first semester at KSU and while he was still learning the ropes it was evident he cared about the curriculum as well as the students. Put in the work and it will pay off.

Solid pick for a teacher really cares, still learning the ropes of teaching but I love his lecture method. Gives partial credit on test and most problems are Pearson problems, and HW are real world problems he has worked on and want you learn from. Definitely give him a chance really care about keeping you interested and occasional pop quizzes .
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Beware of pop quizzes
